name: GroovyDo
overview:
GroovyDo is a free service that allows users to find deals and items that are setup on their “wish lists” as they travel, wherever they go. GroovyDo is scheduled to beta launch June 1 2011.

With nearly 100,000 eager registered accounts prior to the beta release, GroovyDo expects to easily reach one million active users within the first year of it’s beta release. GroovyDo and it’s parent company, GeodexÂ® Search, have multiple patents pending for what GroovyDo calls its “secret sauce”.

Using proprietary technologies, GroovyDo is able to serve its users with relevant content in real-time, changing how you find items that are on your wish list and at the price you want to pay.

video_embeds.description: See how GroovyDo works! GroovyDo constantly searches for deals and items on your wish list as you travel, wherever you go! Use GroovyDo to help you find items that you have been searching for and at the right price. I GroovyDo, Do You? Sign-up for GroovyD
